card.name: Cursed Recording
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a time counter on Cursed Recording. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Disturbing Mirth
card.text: When Disturbing Mirth enters, you may sacrifice another enchantment or creature. If you do, draw two cards. When you sacrifice Disturbing Mirth, manifest dread. (Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature and the other into your graveyard. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

card.name: Veteran Survivor
card.text: Survival — At the beginning of your second main phase, if Veteran Survivor is tapped, exile up to one target card from a graveyard. As long as there are three or more cards exiled with Veteran Survivor, it gets +3/+3 and has hexproof. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
